caption: Insert Embed
doc: This action allows you to insert an embed at a specified index in the editor's content.

AJP.caption: Index
AJP.doc: The index at which to insert the embed.
AJP.name: index

AJQ.caption: Type
AJQ.doc: The type of embed to insert, such as "image", "video", or "audio".
AJQ.name: type

AJR.caption: Value
AJR.doc: The value of the embed to insert, which can be anything depending on the type of embed.
AJR.name: value
